item.title: [EU][Web Cloud] - Outlook Web Access mailbox migration
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Apr 8, 16:10 UTC  -  Aug 30, 16:15 UTC

Mar 28, 04:46 UTC
Update - We will be undergoing scheduled maintenance during this time.

Mar 28, 00:43 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Web Cloud offer.

Start time : 08/04/2024 16:10 UTC
End time : 30/08/2024 16:15 UTC
Service impact : Service interruption is expected for a few minutes to a few hours
Service improvement : The purpose of this operation is to migrate MXPLAN mailboxes under Outlook Web Access (OWA) to the new Zimbra Webmail.
No action is required from the customers.
For further information, please find attached a link to the FAQ: https://help.ovhcloud.com/csm/fr-mx-plan-zimbra-faq?id=kb_article_view&sysparm_article=KB0061410

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [GRA2][Web Hosting] - Cluster003 - Filerz857, 858, 855, 878, 915, 917, 914
item.description:
Mar 29, 12:59 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 29/03/2024 09:50 UTC
End time : 29/03/2024 11:10 UTC

item.title: [GRA][Web Hosting] - Cluster005/Cluster006
item.description:
Mar 28, 11:40 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 28/03/2024 10:20 UTC
End time : 28/03/2024 11:33 UTC
Service impact : Slowness was observed on websites hosted on Custer005 and Cluster006
Root cause : Clusters overcharge due to a storage slowness
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Mar 28, 10:56 UTC
Update - Slowness is also observed for websites hosted on Custer006

Mar 28, 10:36 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 28/03/2024 10:20 UTC
Service impact : Slowness on websites hosted on Custer005
Ongoing actions : Investigating
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.
